body.name: Seat Cushion, Chair Cushions, Office Chair Cushions, Anti-Slip Bottom & Removable Cover Tailbone Pain Relief Cushion, Memory Foam Seat Cushion for Office, Wheelchair, Car (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 12 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: [Ergonomic Contour Design] Our cushions are ergonomically designed and shaped to fit the body's curves, providing full support for your hips and relieving pressure.

[Premium Gel Memory Foam] The high-quality cold gel memory foam allows you to sit even for long periods of time without feeling hot or uncomfortable, and when the cushion is not pressed by an external force it can bounce back to its original shape after a few seconds.

[Anti-Slip Bottom & Removable Cover] Cushion cover is equipped with a zipper, which can be easily removed for cleaning, and the bottom surface of the cushion is made of non-slip material to ensure your safety.
[Wide Range of Applications] This cushion is extremely practical, you can use it in the office, wheelchair, car or at home , it is sized to fit most seats.
[Amazing Gift] This cushion is not only comfortable; it looks good, too. You can give it as a gift to your coworker, family or friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I thought about getting a new office chair, but really my main problem was bad cushioning. I thought I would give this cushion a try this first. And even if it wasn't good enough to make the old chair livable, at least I could use it on a new chair, right?So far it's meeting my expectations. The size is big enough to cover almost the entire seat (larger than other foam cushions I was looking at). The cushion is thick and dense enough that I don't sink down and feel the chair surface anymore. I used to feel my hip bone poking against the hard seat, so this is a big relief.The foam seems to have good rebound. It arrived vacuum sealed and puffed up almost immediately upon releasing it from the plastic. Every time I get up, it puffs up pretty quickly. I guess time will tell on how long its resilience will last. Only gripe is it does have that new foam chemical smell, but it is lessening over time.I don't know how well the gel is working, but I haven't felt like the seat had gotten too hot while I've been sitting anyway. The grippy dots on the bottom do help the cushion stay in place, and I like the velour fabric because I feel like that also adds a bit of grip.All in all, I'm glad I made the purchase. My sitting experience is much improved, so I feel like I got my money's worth (especially since I got it on discount during the holidays).Edit: After having the cushion for a few months, I can say that the chemical smell does last quite a while. I have had a similar scent issue with gel/foam combos before. I Febreze'd the pillow with the fabric cover on a couple of times, and that did help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy and cool
reviews.reviewText: First time buying a seat cushion; a worthy purchase I have made in a while. It adds the extra needed comfort, stays cool; and it's aerated at the right place. The fact that the cover can be washed is a plus!I like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Softer than expected
reviews.reviewText: I like the fit of this cushion and when you make sure to sit on it correctly it seems to improve your posture.The problem is you sink in immediately and its not firm whatsoever. It truly is soft memory foam.Wish they designed it with a firmer form inside it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Utilizing this cushion for long periods of sitting and it makes ALL the difference! No more sore tailbone!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s comfortable, but it stinks
reviews.reviewText: I like the comfort of the product and the size is nice, but it seems to be offgassing at tremendous amount. It stinks. A very nauseating smell like burnt peanuts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use after surgery because I needed a little extra height so I could get out of a chair. Very comfortable and serve the purpose well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Like most people, I made a bunch of purchases from Amazon around Black Friday and Cyber Monday.This was by far one of the best purchases during that buying spree.I had purchased a seat cushion from Amazon during similar sales a couple of years back. I thought it was time get a new one.It is light years better than the one it was intended to replace. And that one was pretty good at the time.It's very comfortable and supportive. It was on sale 46% off and turned out to be cheaper than my old one.If you have issues that require a seat cushion or you simply want extra cushion for your office chair, you cannot go wrong with this product.I bought a second one for me and an additional one to send as a gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this cushion for a few days . I sit a lot for work and i have a bad back , this cushion is nice and thick and very very comfortable. It has eased pressure on my tailbone and back and it is much easier to get up and down now. The cushion is nice and thick as you can see it is bigger than my pointer finger . Highly recommend this cushion for anyone with back problems.
